# startIndex

**Instance Property**

The position of the first element in a nonempty collection.

## Declaration

```swift
var startIndex: Substring.UnicodeScalarView.Index { get }
```

## Discussion

If the collection is empty, `startIndex` is equal to `endIndex`.
title: startIndex
